Host: [Engaging tone] Hey there, welcome back to our podcast where we explore the cutting-edge of technology and its impact on our daily lives. Today, we’re diving into a topic that’s not only fascinating but also incredibly crucial – the future of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare.
